long_description: The Kelty Yukon 48 external frame pack is perfect for scouts, young teens and adults with short torsos. It sports an adjustable suspension that grows with young hikers. Ventilated back panel, hipbelt and shoulder straps help keep backpackers cool and comfortable while evenly distributing the load. Dual-density foam hipbelt and padded shoulder straps provide cushioned comfort for the long haul. Belt stabilizers and an adjustable sternum strap help stabilize the load. Pulleylike Scherer Cinch(TM) system allows you to easily personalize the hipbelt's fit. Top-loading main compartment with spindrift collar and zippered sleeping bag compartment with heavy-duty zipper are sized just right for weekend backpacking adventures. Hydration sleeve holds a reservoir (sold separately). Zippered side pockets, mesh water bottle pockets and front pocket organize essentials; ice axe loop and daisy chain let you lash gear to the outside of the pack. The Kelty Yukon 48 external frame pack is made of tough, 420-denier polyester and reinforced with 420-denier oxford polyester.
short_description: The Kelty Yukon 48 external frame pack is perfect for scouts, young teens and adults with short torsos. It sports an adjustable suspension that grows with young hikers.
